info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 5:30PM PDT until August 31 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM PDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SAN BERNARDINO AND WEST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 528 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles south of Sandy Valley, or 15 miles west of Primm, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Primm, Mountain Pass and Sandy Valley. This includes Interstate 15 in California between mile markers 161 and 186. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
